title: More Than Friends
description: They were best friendsâ€¦ Unfortunately.When her sleazy ex cheated on her, Alice turned to her best friend Zack for support. Her head tells her never to love again, but in the arms of Zack, her heart has other ideas. And so does Zack. How can he tell her how much he wants her, when one night of passion could destroy the friendship of a lifetime?
author: Susan  Child
